participant_1.background:
I do not do my laundry as often as I should.
I'm single and I live with my cat, Speckles.
my brother used to be in the navy.
I am from a small town in the Midwest where life is slower and more relaxed.
when people don t like my social media posts , it upsets me.

participant_2.background:
I am so happy to be close to my parents and my daughters are really excited about our new home.
I'm afraid of being judged for my ethnicity.
i like to draw and paint in my spare time.
i love owning nice office supplies.
I am not sure if I am a healthy person, but I know that I am trying my best.

content.text: Hello there, how are you doing?
I am doing well, thank you for asking! How about you?
I am doing well, thank you!
That's good to hear! So, what are some of your hobbies?
I like to read, write, and spend time with my cat.
That's cool, I like to draw and paint in my spare time.
Oh, that's cool! I used to draw a lot when I was younger, but I haven't really done it in a while.
You should try it again! It's really relaxing and it's a great way to express yourself.
Maybe I will! I've been meaning to get back into it.
That's great! I'm sure you'll have a lot of fun.
Thank you, I'm looking forward to it!
You're welcome! So, where are you from?
I'm from a small town in the Midwest.
Oh, that's cool! I've always wanted to visit the Midwest.
It's really nice here! It's a lot slower-paced than other places, but it's a great place to live.
That sounds really nice. I live in a big city, so I could definitely use a little less hustle and bustle.
Haha, yeah, I can imagine!
So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a writer.
Oh, that's cool! What kind of writing do you do?
I write mostly fiction, but I also do some nonfiction.
That's awesome! I love reading, so I'm always looking for new books to read.
Awesome! If you're ever looking for recommendations, let me know!
I will! Thank you
